property.name: mode
property.label: Mode
property.description: The mode allows you to select the banner blueprint to be applied.

property.name: breadcrumbsItems
property.label: Breadcrumbs items
property.description: Links to parent and current pages in Markdown format. Leave blank to get slots in LWR.

property.name: headingPrimary
property.label: Heading (primary)
property.description: Clearly identifies the primary purpose or action of the site, service or product.

property.name: headingSecondary
property.label: Heading (secondary)
property.description: Adds additional context to the heading.

property.name: headingBackgroundDisplay
property.label: Heading background display
property.description: Adds a background to the heading when mode is intermediate or advanced.

property.name: abstract
property.label: Abstract
property.description: Gives additional context when the title alone would be insufficient - in Markdown format. Leave blank to get a slot in LWR.
property.default: The hero banner reflects the goals or purpose of the site, service or product.

property.name: heroImage
property.label: Hero image source
property.description: Allows for different content to stand out and provide additional context - as an URL. Leave blank to omit.

property.name: heroImageResponsiveTreatment
property.label: Hero image responsive treatment
property.description: Defines how the hero image is treated for responsiveness.

property.name: heroImageAlignment
property.label: Hero image alignment
property.description: Defines how the hero image aligns horizontally.

property.name: backgroundColour
property.label: Background colour style
property.description: Colour theme style used for the background.

property.name: backgroundImageSm
property.label: Background image source (mobile)
property.description: URL of the backgroup image for mobile.

property.name: backgroundImageLg
property.label: Background image source (desktop)
property.description: URL of the backgroup image for desktop.

property.name: backgroundImageAlignment
property.label: Background image alignment
property.description: Alignment of the background image using a valid background-position-x value.

property.name: backgroundMinHeight
property.label: Background minimum height
property.description: Minimum height in pixels; leave empty to omit.

property.name: ctaType
property.label: Call to action type for advanced banners.

property.name: buttonPrimary
property.label: Primary button action
property.description: Primary button action in Markdown link format for advanced banners.

property.name: buttonSecondary
property.label: Secondary button action
property.description: Secondary button action in Markdown link format for advanced banners. Leave blank to omit.

property.name: ctaConfig
property.label: Call to Action configuration
property.description: JSON configuration of the Call to Action for link list and icon tiles.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
